channel.title: Grafana on Lubolab
channel.description: Recent content in Grafana on Lubolab

item.title: Building Sensor Network: Data visualisation with Grafana
item.author: lubomir.kamensky@gmail.com (Lubomir Kamensky)
item.description: In the prior post we have built the history layer, now it is the time to look into its data. The idea is to get some simple interface providing interactive access to any data we want. Let’s try to achieve that with the leading open source software for time series analytics, Grafana. Installation I installed Grafana on my development machine using Docker. How to install Docker can be found here.
